title: 2015년 State of West Virginia v. Jimmy Dale Cearley 사건
summary: 미국 West Virginia, WV 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: State of West Virginia v. Jimmy Dale Cearley. 판결일: 2015-03-16. 법원: West Virginia Supreme Court.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: State of West Virginia v. Jimmy Dale Cearley
**판결일**: 2015-03-16
**법원**: West Virginia Supreme Court
**관할**: West Virginia, WV


## 판결문 요약

                                STATE OF WEST VIRGINIA

                              SUPREME COURT OF APPEALS


State of West Virginia, Plaintiff Below,                                             FILED
Respondent                                                                        March 16, 2015
                                                                                RORY L. PERRY II, CLERK
                                                                              SUPREME COURT OF APPEALS
vs) No. 14-0547 (Cabell County 06-F-101)                                          OF WEST VIRGINIA


Jimmy Dale Cearley, Defendant Below,
Petitioner

                                 MEMORANDUM DECISION
        Petitioner Jimmy Dale Cearley, by counsel J. Anthony Spenia, appeals the Circuit Court
of Cabell County’s April 15, 2014, order resentencing him to consecutive terms of incarceration
of ten to twenty-five years for his conviction of second degree sexual assault and, pursuant to the
recidivist statute, a life sentence for his conviction of unlawful wounding. The State, by counsel
Christopher C. Dodrill, filed a response and a supplemental appendix. Petitioner filed a reply. On
appeal, petitioner alleges that the circuit court erred in refusing to give a jury instruction on the
lesser included offense of first degree sexual abuse and in imposing a life recidivist sentence.1

        This Court has considered the parties’ briefs and the record on appeal. The facts and legal...
